name: bitwarden
title: Search Bitwarden Vault Items
description:
Access your Bitwarden Vault Items from Raycast.
 Requires the bitwarden CLI to be installed. An installation guide is available here: https://bitwarden.com/help/article/cli/#download-and-install
author: pomdtr

preferences.name: clientId
preferences.title: Client ID
preferences.description: This value is unique to your account and does not change. See https://bitwarden.com/help/article/personal-api-key/#get-your-personal-api-key for instructions.

preferences.name: clientSecret
preferences.title: Client Secret
preferences.description: This value is unique and can be rotated. See https://bitwarden.com/help/article/personal-api-key/#get-your-personal-api-key for instructions.

preferences.name: path
preferences.title: Path Environment Variable
preferences.description: Folder where the bitwarden-cli is located. Default Value match with the standard brew install location.
